entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 12:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow Grains
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
